title: The Cooperative Effect of Co and CoO in Co/CoO Enabled Efficient Catalytic Hydrogenation and Demethoxylation of Guaiacol to Cyclohexanol
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00183D, Paper
Bhupendra Pratap Singh, Ganesh Sunil More, Rajaram Bal, Rajendra Srivastava
The selective catalytic transformations of lignin-derived phenolics into cyclohexanol provide an alternative renewable solution to fine-chemical industries over the fossil-fuel-dependent routes. Herein, low-cost, non-noble metal-based Co/CoO catalysts with oxygen vacancies...
